html: Nearly two decades into the 21st century, it’s long past time that our daughters are paid the same way we pay our sons. Yesterday the House took a big step in the right direction by passing the #PaycheckFairnessAct, and I was proud to help lead that effort. (1/2)
text:
Nearly two decades into the 21st century, it’s long past time that our daughters are paid the same way we pay our sons. 

Yesterday the House took a big step in the right direction by passing the #PaycheckFairnessAct, and I was proud to help lead that effort. (1/2)

html: The recent accusations of dual loyalty call into question the equal footing of Jewish Members in elected office and, by extension, all Jews living in America. I am proud to vote on this resolution in condemnation of this rhetoric. (10/10)
text: The recent accusations of dual loyalty call into question the equal footing of Jewish Members in elected office and, by extension, all Jews living in America. I am proud to vote on this resolution in condemnation of this rhetoric. (10/10)

html: I believe that I speak clearly, for all fellow Jewish veterans, that this echoes of language that has been used to marginalize and persecute the Jewish people for centuries. (9/10)
text: I believe that I speak clearly, for all fellow Jewish veterans, that this echoes of language that has been used to marginalize and persecute the Jewish people for centuries. (9/10)

html: Am I to look back on my military career and the sacrifices it meant for my family and remain silent in the face of people questioning my loyalty to our country? (8/10)
text: Am I to look back on my military career and the sacrifices it meant for my family and remain silent in the face of people questioning my loyalty to our country? (8/10)

html: In the first three years my husband and I were married, we spent almost two years apart so that we could both serve at sea and deploy three times. Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (7/10)
text: In the first three years my husband and I were married, we spent almost two years apart so that we could both serve at sea and deploy three times. Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (7/10)

html: Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (6/10)
text: Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (6/10)

html: I deployed six times, serving in six ships in the Middle East and Western Pacific, working under challenging conditions while operating complex weapons systems, overseeing nuclear reactors, driving ships, and ultimately commanding a combat-ready unit of 400 sailors. (5/10)
text: I deployed six times, serving in six ships in the Middle East and Western Pacific, working under challenging conditions while operating complex weapons systems, overseeing nuclear reactors, driving ships, and ultimately commanding a combat-ready unit of 400 sailors. (5/10)

html: I subsequently repeated that oath six times—at every promotion in rank and most recently when I had the honor to become a Member of Congress. Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (4/10)
text: I subsequently repeated that oath six times—at every promotion in rank and most recently when I had the honor to become a Member of Congress. Is that not enough to prove my loyalty to our nation? (4/10)

html: At the age of 17, when I entered the United States Naval Academy, I first took the oath to “support and defend the Constitution against all enemies, foreign and domestic.” (3/10)
text: At the age of 17, when I entered the United States Naval Academy, I first took the oath to “support and defend the Constitution against all enemies, foreign and domestic.” (3/10)

html: I am a Jewish American woman who served for 20 years in uniform and continue to serve in the United States Congress. (2/10)
text: I am a Jewish American woman who served for 20 years in uniform and continue to serve in the United States Congress. (2/10)

html: 90% of Americans favor expanded background checks for gun purchases. 96% of background checks are done within 3 business days. #HR1112 would give the FBI more time to finish the remaining 4% of background checks to help ensure guns don’t fall into criminal hands. #EndGunViolence

html: I took an oath, both during my 20 years in the Navy and now in Congress, to support and defend the Constitution. This unconstitutional action by the President will steal from military readiness in response to something that is not a true national emergency.
text: I took an oath, both during my 20 years in the Navy and now in Congress, to support and defend the Constitution. This unconstitutional action by the President will steal from military readiness in response to something that is not a true national emergency.

html: Democrats and Republicans in Congress have shown a willingness to work together to defend our border, as we were elected to do. This cannot be supplanted by unilateral executive action.
text: Democrats and Republicans in Congress have shown a willingness to work together to defend our border, as we were elected to do. This cannot be supplanted by unilateral executive action.

text:
Today we recognize #USArmy Sgt. 1st Class Eugene Ashley, Jr., the first African-American Special Forces Soldier to receive the #MedalofHonor for his actions in the rescue of SF Soldiers trapped at Camp Lang Vei during the Tet Offensive in 1968.

html: Senate Republicans won’t budge and refuse to pass House legislation that would open all of government. As they stall, I have voted for individual bills to reopen & fund: Treasury Department & IRS Agriculture Department & FDA FAA & HUD National parks, museums, EPA
text:
Senate Republicans won’t budge and refuse to pass House legislation that would open all of government.  As they stall, I have voted for individual bills to reopen & fund:

 Treasury Department & IRS
 Agriculture Department & FDA
 FAA & HUD
 National parks, museums, EPA

html: The 20-day shutdown has gone on far too long. Yesterday I voted for a House bill that would reopen the Treasury Dept. and Internal Revenue Service to ensure that Virginians receive their tax refunds in-full and on time. I call on Senate Republicans to quickly follow suit.
text: The 20-day shutdown has gone on far too long.  Yesterday I voted for a House bill that would reopen the Treasury Dept. and Internal Revenue Service to ensure that Virginians receive their tax refunds in-full and on time.  I call on Senate Republicans to quickly follow suit.

html: Tonight the President said it’s “immoral” to “do nothing,” but the House has passed bipartisan legislation that would open government. It’s long past time for this 18-day shutdown to end. Our Coast Guard, TSA, and other federal workers shouldn’t be hostages in political fights.
text: Tonight the President said it’s “immoral” to “do nothing,” but the House has passed bipartisan legislation that would open government.  It’s long past time for this 18-day shutdown to end.  Our Coast Guard, TSA, and other federal workers shouldn’t be hostages in political fights.
